languages.text: {n}Кибелла замолкает, чуть ведет головой и медленно, завороженно достает из ножен черный кинжал.{/n} "Смерть шепчет мне: Домин'{name} досто{mf|ин|йна} нести знаки Его. Скажи, желаешь ли ты почтить плоть свою Его дарами?" {n}Встревоженные взгляды офицеров обращаются к клинку в руках культистки смерти.{/n}

{n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла замолкает, чуть ведет головой и медленно, завороженно достает из ножен черный кинжал.{/n} "Смерть шепчет мне: Домин'{name} досто{mf|ин|йна} нести знаки Его. Скажи, желаешь ли ты почтить плоть свою Его дарами?" {n}Встревоженные взгляды офицеров обращаются к клинку в руках культистки смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}She stops and turns her head slightly, breaking eye contact with you. Then slowly, as if entranced, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me: Enim'{name} is worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers around you shoot anxious glances at the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

{n}She stops and turns her head slightly, breaking eye contact with you. Then slowly, as if entranced, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me: Enim'{name} is worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers around you shoot anxious glances at the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hace una pausa y ladea la cabeza. Después desenfunda su daga negra lentamente, como si estuviese sumida en un trance.{/n} «La muerte me susurra. Es usted {mf|digno|digna} de llevar Su marca. Dígame, Domin'{name}, ¿desea honrar su piel con Sus dones?». {n}Adviertes que varios de tus oficiales intercambian miradas de preocupación al ver el puñal en manos de Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hace una pausa y ladea la cabeza. Después desenfunda su daga negra lentamente, como si estuviese sumida en un trance.{/n} «La muerte me susurra. Es usted {mf|digno|digna} de llevar Su marca. Dígame, Domin'{name}, ¿desea honrar su piel con Sus dones?». {n}Adviertes que varios de tus oficiales intercambian miradas de preocupación al ver el puñal en manos de Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女は言葉を止めて首をかしげる。そして、トランス状態であるかのように、ゆっくりと黒い短剣を抜いた。{/n}「死神が私に囁くの。あなたは主の印にふさわしいと。教えて、ドミン・{name}。あなたは自らの肉体で、主の恵みを受ける意思はある？」{n}あなたは数人の士官たちが、キベラの手に握られた刃物に目を向けつつ、不安げに視線を交わしていることに気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は言葉を止めて首をかしげる。そして、トランス状態であるかのように、ゆっくりと黒い短剣を抜いた。{/n}「死神が私に囁くの。あなたは主の印にふさわしいと。教えて、ドミン・{name}。あなたは自らの肉体で、主の恵みを受ける意思はある？」{n}あなたは数人の士官たちが、キベラの手に握られた刃物に目を向けつつ、不安げに視線を交わしていることに気づく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}她住了口，歪着头。随后，她慢慢抽出了黑色的匕首，仿佛处于恍惚状态。{/n}“死亡对我低语，说你也值得刻上不死之神的印记。告诉我吧，秘者{name}，你愿意将祂的恩赐铭刻在你的肉体上吗？”{n}当绮贝菈抽出匕首时，你注意到几位军官担忧地互视一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她住了口，歪着头。随后，她慢慢抽出了黑色的匕首，仿佛处于恍惚状态。{/n}“死亡对我低语，说你也值得刻上不死之神的印记。告诉我吧，秘者{name}，你愿意将祂的恩赐铭刻在你的肉体上吗？”{n}当绮贝菈抽出匕首时，你注意到几位军官担忧地互视一眼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie hält inne und neigt den Kopf. Dann zieht sie langsam wie in Trance ihren schwarzen Dolch.{/n} "Der Tod flüstert mir etwas zu. Ihr seid würdig, Seine Zeichen zu tragen. Sagt mir, Domin'{name}, wollt Ihr Euer Fleisch mit Seinen Geschenken ehren?" {n}Du bemerkst, dass mehrere Offiziere besorgte Blicke austauschen, als sie die Klinge in Kibellahs Hand sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie hält inne und neigt den Kopf. Dann zieht sie langsam wie in Trance ihren schwarzen Dolch.{/n} "Der Tod flüstert mir etwas zu. Ihr seid würdig, Seine Zeichen zu tragen. Sagt mir, Domin'{name}, wollt Ihr Euer Fleisch mit Seinen Geschenken ehren?" {n}Du bemerkst, dass mehrere Offiziere besorgte Blicke austauschen, als sie die Klinge in Kibellahs Hand sehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elle s'interrompt et incline la tête, puis elle dégaine sa dague noire à gestes lents, comme si elle était en transe.{/n} « La mort murmure à mon oreille. Vous êtes digne de porter Ses marques. Dites-moi, Domin'{name}, souhaitez-vous honorer votre chair de Ses augustes dons ? » {n}Vous remarquez que plusieurs officiers échangent des regards inquiets à la vue de la lame que Kibellah tient entre ses mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle s'interrompt et incline la tête, puis elle dégaine sa dague noire à gestes lents, comme si elle était en transe.{/n} « La mort murmure à mon oreille. Vous êtes digne de porter Ses marques. Dites-moi, Domin'{name}, souhaitez-vous honorer votre chair de Ses augustes dons ? » {n}Vous remarquez que plusieurs officiers échangent des regards inquiets à la vue de la lame que Kibellah tient entre ses mains.{/n}

Tell me, Domin', do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, durup başını yana eğiyor. Sonra da transa girmişçesine yavaşça kara hançerini çekiyor.{/n} "Ölüm bana fısıldıyor. O'nun işaretini taşımaya layıksın. Söyler misin Domin'{name}, O'nun armağanlarıyla bedenine şeref vermek istiyor musun?" {n}Kibellah'nın elindeki bıçağı süzen kimi subayların endişeli bakışlarını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She stops and tilts her head. Then slowly, as if in a trance, she draws her black dagger.{/n} "Death whispers to me. You are worthy of bearing His marks. Tell me, Domin'{name}, do you wish to honour your flesh with His gifts?" {n}You notice several officers exchange worried glances as they eye the blade in Kibellah's hands.{/n}
